name: Zenith & Crew
profile: Hello everyone and welcome to Zenith & Crew, where Kat and Doug MacBerrie live-react to and discuss all the new shows you can find on Disney+, including shows like Amphibia, Monsters at Work, and The Owl House. Listen to our review discussions of Star Wars shows, like The Mandalorian and The Bad Batch, and see our reactions to the latest installments from Marvel, like Falcon & Winter Soldier, Loki and What if? We have many thoughts and many videos to react to, so please like, comment, and subscribe for more content.
